options.name: Savage
options.description: Lose 2 Dodge and Block while gaining +2 Damage to all Melee Weapons and +1 to Melee Attacks

options.name: Ferocious Strikes
options.description: Gain +1 Damage to Melee Attacks and +1 Strength

options.name: Reaction : Berserker Endurance
options.description: In response to being the target of a Melee Attack, you make a Resilience Check instead of a Block or Dodge Check agains the Attack Check. On a success, you do not take any Damage. On a failure, you reduce the Damage by a result equal to your Resilience Check.

options.name: Unyielding
options.description: You do not suffer the negative effects of being in Lifeline until you reach 1 Lifeline point, at which point you fall Unconcious

options.name: Executer
options.description: You can Critically Hit with any Melee Weapon or Unarmed Attack.

options.name: Free Action : Fury Swipe
options.description: Directly after taking the Attack Action, you make an additional Attack with a 1d4 Penalty.
